page.title: 04Chobham Park Farm (Goodwin)
page.content: Mrs Goodwin has{25 horses}at Chobham Park farm. The husband rides but the wife doesn't. She has 56 Acres of land. They do not own a riding school but people own their horses and come to ride at her{stables.}The owner only trains her own horses. They keep horses for the joy of it. The vet. comes to the stables every fortnight. Mrs Goodwin thinks horses should be used for{hunting}because they enjoy it. They have some{cattle}which are sent to market. It is quite hard working on a farm. They don't get many {foals.}They buy horses when they are about two years old. They use their horses for show jumping. They have {three cats}which are very friendly. They are going to knock down their house when they move into another house. They have lived there for ten years.
